      • findPersonalTasks

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public List<Task> findPersonalTasks(String assignee)
        Description copied from interface: TaskService
        Find all tasks for the specified user. The returned tasks will include both tasks for which the user is the assignee, and tasks for which the user is a candidate.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        list of tasks
